item.content: They thinks that it is important that only those who are competent make decisions that are important.
When offered a lot, they choses not to take so much of it. They thinks that for being comfortable, they does not need much.
They thinks that it is important to be persistent. When they is convinced of something, they thinks sticking to it is a good thing.
They thinks that only when they is disciplined, they will accomplish something in life. They thinks that it is important for them to maintain control over themself.
They thinks that having a goal in mind to work for is important. They thinks that it is honourable to have clear ambition in life.
They thinks that it is good to be open to change. Only if they is flexible, they thinks, will they be able to deal with life.
Others are important to them. They thinks that it is good to help even if they does not get anything in return.
They thinks that it is important that things are done in the correct way. They believes, things work out only when done carefully, precise, and accurate.
From time to time, it is important for them that people enjoy their lives. They can think of many things that make life comfortable.
For them it is very important to live around people who look after each other. They believes that a strong community is crucial.
They thinks that it is unfair if people are treated differently, depending on certain attributes they have. People should have an equal chance to participate.
They thinks that it important that every group in society is proportionally represented. To them, fair decisions should only be made when everyone has an equal saying in it.
They is convinced that it is good to help each other out. They believes that people should support each other more.
It is important to them to have strong leadership. They thinks that complicated decisions should be made by those in charge.
They believes that it is important to work hard in order to achieve things in life.
It is important to them that in important decisions those that are affected have a say in it.
They thinks that it is okay to make mistakes. They thinks that people should learn to accept other peopleâ€™s or their own shortcomings.
It is important for them that things are being planned carefully. They believes that it a good plan is essential to most things.
For them, life is about self-realization. They believes that it is important to do the things in life that are interesting and that help themself to grow.
They thinks that not everything needs a plan. For them it is important to sometimes be open to do things spontaneously.
In their view, tradition can help people to orient themselves and give them stability. They therefore believes that tradition is very important.
In their view, society should not be restrictive, and anyone should have the chance to stand up for themselves. They thinks that being independent is very important.
In their view, society would work a lot better if people behaved responsible. It is important for them to think about the people around them.
They believes that the world is changing rapidly. They therefore thinks that willingness to change is essential.
They believes that everyone in society should enjoy life more. For them it makes not much sense for a society to suppress the individual needs with social norms.
